name: Kav Goldor
content:
Kav Goldor was a Human male who lived in Mos Espa on Tatooine. Some time after 0 BBY, he hired a group of spacers to defend Mos Espa from an attack by Tusken Raiders.
Kav Goldor was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Kav Goldor was added to the game along with the "Tusken Army" Heroic Encounter, introduced with the release of the "Chapter 7" update, on November 1, 2007.
